text: Timiharumadhye jo mardachan ra aphna pachadi svasniharu chadchan, tinale aphna svasniharuko lagi hakako nimti vasiyata (icchapatra) garera ja'una, jasabata tinaka svasniharule eka varsasam'ma pha'ida utha'una ra gharabata kasaile tinala'i niskasita na garos. Ho, yadi tiniharu aphaim gharabata janchin ra aphno hitama caheko kama gardachin bhane yasama timila'i kunai gunaha humdaina, allaha sarvasaktimana ra sarvabud'dhi sampanna cha
